channel.title: Pymol Tips on PyMOL Notes

item.title: PyMOL Shortcuts
item.description: This page describes the installation and use of the pymolshortucs built by B.H.M. Mooers and described in Mooers (2020) 1. Install the date time module The pymolshortcuts.py script has a shortcut to timestamp filenames produced by PyMOL. To use this, the date time module needs to be installed. Because I have MacPorts on my system, I’ll used the suggested MacPorts installation instructions. In a terminal window, type the following command:
